âš ï¸ What they miss: the C-wire problem. Many older homes don't have a common wire, and your smart thermostat NEEDS power. Using the fan wire as a workaround can damage your system. Also â€” if you have a heat pump, the wiring is completely different from standard HVAC.

ğŸ’¡ George's Pro Tip: Before buying, pop off your current thermostat and count the wires. Take a photo. Most smart thermostat brands have a compatibility checker on their website. Five minutes of checking saves a $200 mistake.
